title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 704 - Criteria Governing Thermal Discharges
content:

State Regulations
§ 704.1 - Water quality standards for thermal discharges
§ 704.2 - Criteria governing thermal discharges
§ 704.3 - Mixing zone criteria
§ 704.4 - Additional limitations or modifications
§ 704.5 - Intake structures
§ 704.6 - Applicability of criteria
§ 704.7 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 704

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 3-0301[2][m], 15-0313, 17-0301

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
